竮字的基本解释

竮
píng
〔竛竮〕见“
竛”。

竮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pīng］
［《廣韻》普丁切，平青，滂。］
［《廣韻》薄經切，平青，並。］
亦作“1”。亦作“2”。
见“竮竛”、“竛竮”。

竮字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【立字部】　竮； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页872第30
【廣韻】普丁切【集韻】【韻會】滂丁切，?音俜。竛竮，行不正也。　又【集韻】傍經切，音缾。義同。

同竮。詳竮字註。
竮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
竮字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pīng］
["Guang Yun" Pu Ding cut, flat green, peng. ]
["Guangyun" thin classic cut, flat green, combined. ]
Also called "1". Also called "2".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Li Zi Department] 　竮; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 872 30
[Guang Yun] Pu Ding Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Pun Ding cut,? Sound.竛竮, it's not right.　[Jiyun] Cut near the meridian, sound bottle. The same meaning. Same as 竮. Detailed note of the word.
